example.text: As a result of alternate splicing and subsequent frameshift, the reported g16 protein is 603 amino acids shorter than the NY-LU-12 product (1123 residues) at its COOH terminus and would therefore lack the epitopes recognized by the autologous serum.

These mutations, identified by standard methods of reverse transcription, PCR,dideoxy-chain termination, and cycle sequencing, alter highly conserved sequences at intron/exon boundaries and prevent the RNA-splicing apparatus from properly recognizing the normal splice junction.
A number of Ags recognized by class I-restricted melanoma-specific T cells have recently been isolated, raising the hope that this will lead to the development of improved therapies.
Exactly how specific splice sites are recognized during the processing of complex precursor messenger RNAs is not clear.
Anti-64kD human autoantigen D1 antibodies recognize specifically a approximately 70kD polypeptide in western blots of extraocular muscle, sternothyroid muscle, and smooth muscle.
example.arg: a approximately 70kD polypeptide in western blots of extraocular muscle, sternothyroid muscle, and smooth muscle

example.text: These bands can be detected with four different specific antibodies recognizing the different nonmuscle myosin heavy chain isoforms (A and B)
example.arg: the different nonmuscle myosin heavy chain isoforms (A and B)

example.text: To define the subcellular location of HVDAC isoforms, HVDAC genes were modified so that the encoded proteins contain COOH-terminal epitopes recognized by either of two monoclonal antibodies.
Individual cell clones were analyzed for STAT1 expression by immunofluorescence with a monoclonal antibody recognizing the STAT1 N-terminus, and by western blotting.
A monoclonal antibody recognizing the STAT1 N-terminus was purchased from Transduction Laboratories (Lexington, KY).
The two forms of Stat3 (Stat3fm and Stat3sm) recognized by this antibody in PKR+/+MEFs are indicated.
example.arg: The two forms of Stat3 (Stat3fm and Stat3sm)

example.text: The lower form of Stat3, Stat3Beta, is not recognized in the immunoprecipitaiton with anti-Stat3 pAb as it is raised against a C-terminal region of Stat3 that is missing in Stat3Beta.
example.arg: The lower form of Stat3, Stat3Beta

example.text: Blots were probed with affinity-purified polyclonal anti-LMP-1 antiserum that recognizes epitopes in the C-terminus of LMP-1 at a 1:200 dilution.
example.arg: epitopes in the C-terminus of LMP-1 at a 1:200 dilution

example.text: Blots were probed with a RAT monoclonal anti-HA antibody (Boehringer-Ingelheim) that recognizes the sequence(YPYDVPDYA) at a 1:500 dilution.

Blots were probed with rabbit polyclonal anti-CD40 antiserum that recognizes the C-terminus of CD40 at a 1:500 dilution, or with rabbit polyclonal anti-GFP or anti-RFP (Clontech) antiserum at a 1:250 dilution.
example.arg: C-terminus of CD40 at a 1:500 dilution
